title: HP Bar Position?
body: Is there ANYYYY way to alter it, just a wee' bit above my character? Its so close to my champ I can't see his/her/it's head sometimes...

replies.body:
There's no way to alter the UI elements in-game unfortunately. Having your HP bar block your champion's head is not normal, though. I'd like to see a screenshot of this and your resolution settings under **VIDEO** in your settings window. 

You can snag a screenshot in-game by slapping that trust F12 key and then finding the screenshot in the following directory:

> **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Screenshots**

Let me know if you have any questions.
